# Throws

## Usage
`@throws {<type>} [<description>]`
 
## Overview
Allows you to document an error that a function might throw.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @throws {InvalidArgumentException}
 */
const funcA = (a) => {
    if (!a) {
        throw new Error();
    }
}
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-throws.html)**
